# cho-breadcrumbs

Breadcrumbs allow users to make selections from a range of values.

## Examples

```html
<cho-breadcrumbs>
  <span>Chocolate</span>
  <span>Design</span>
  <span>System</span>
</cho-breadcrumbs>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description              | Type     | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `separator` | `separator` | Custom separator string. | `string` | `'/'`   |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                             |
| ---- | --------------------------------------- |
|      | The primary content of the breadcrumbs. |
